greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of cubes of primes = 1 mod 3 dividing n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = p^3 if p = 1 (mod 3), 0 otherwise.
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(f=factor(n)); sum(k=1, #f~, if (((p=f[k,1])%3) == 1, p^3)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 10 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
